labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord doesn't shut down, rather crashes with an error message in the client. (Pic of message: ) This can be fixed by control + r or fully exiting the client and relaunching it.
data.expected_result: To go back to the last channel I was in,
data.short_description: Discord Canary In-client crash when quickswitching out of group DM with only yourself.
data.steps_to_repro: - Control + K into a group DM with only yourself. - Control K and hit enter to go back to the last channel as fast as possible.
